Anyone want sponsored me?

Right now I'm experimenting and liking it, a lot. Excellent work, friends!

Regards,

don't hesitate to bother us if you run into a wall...
Oh wow this whole site is beautiful! And your work looks great @trevor!
@StuartH @ne1up , thanks! It's definitely NOT finished by farrr...

What is that 'homepage' coded with? I unfortunately am only barely-qualified to touch HTML/CSS But I can break things like crazy for weeks on the road to getting it looking like something you'd have to pay for.

EDIT: Oh found your site on convoe? Love that sidebar! Looks fantastic @trevor

What is that 'homepage' coded with? I unfortunately am only barely-qualified to touch HTML/CSS But I can break things like crazy for weeks on the road to getting it looking like something you'd have to pay for.

That's definitely not NodeBB on the homepage of the site. That is an old imageboard I'm going to retire soon to replace with NodeBB.

What is that 'homepage' coded with? I unfortunately am only barely-qualified to touch HTML/CSS But I can break things like crazy for weeks on the road to getting it looking like something you'd have to pay for.

That's definitely not NodeBB on the homepage of the site. That is an old imageboard I'm going to retire soon to replace with NodeBB.

Oh right, I meant the index of NodeBB, the page with all the category boxes.

Your homepage is super interesting also though - I had looked at several message board options for speediness but in the end, eh.. Best I could find was some variant of 4chan or something.

It's definitely debatable what part of NodeBB makes it so fast... is it our technology stack (web sockets + redis + node), or is it just simply the fact that it's a single page app?

Could be both, too...
